issues.description: The problem statement text on line 17 refers to the attribute as 'inscribedStudents', while the UML diagram (line 65) and the solution code (line 7) consistently use 'numberOfInscribedStudents'. This inconsistency between the textual description and the more precise UML/code can cause minor confusion for students when implementing the attributes.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement text on line 17 to refer to the attribute as 'numberOfInscribedStudents' to align with the UML diagram and the solution code, ensuring consistent naming across all artifacts.
